mapper.insert: insert into ams_board (lot, cin, cout, total, writer) values(#{lot}, #{cin}, #{cout}, #{total}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, lot, cin, cout, total, writer, regdate, viewcnt from ams_board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, lot, cin, cout, total, writer, regdate, viewcnt from ams_board order by bno desc limit 1
mapper.update: update ams_board set cin =#{cin}, cout =#{cout}, writer =#{writer} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, lot, cin, cout, total, writer, regdate, viewcnt from ams_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
